segments.source_content:
---
slug: /209
title: "This Week In React #209: Next.js, Compiler, Motion, Remix, Storybook, Toldo, state-in-url, Expo 52, Screens, Skia List, Audio API, Edge-to-Edge, Windows, Godot, True Sheet, Nitro, Worklets, Node.js, TS, Rspack..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 11-13-2024
---

translations.ja: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64
みなさん、こんにちは！

segments.source_content: This week has been calm on the React side, I couldn't really pick any headline despite various interesting releases and articles.

translations.ja: 今週のReact周りは落ち着いており、興味深いリリースや記事はあったものの、特に目立つヘッドラインは見当たりませんでした。

segments.source_content: Once again, the React Native ecosystem is on fire, with Expo 52, but not only!

translations.ja: 再び、React Nativeエコシステムが盛り上がっています。Expo 52のリリースなどがありますが、それだけではありません！

segments.source_content: Last chance to answer the [State of React 2024](https://survey.devographics.com/en-US/survey/state-of-react/2024?source=this_week_in_react) survey that is closing soon. But don't worry, I'll now annoy you with another one that just opened 😃: [State of JS 2024](https://survey.devographics.com/en-US/survey/state-of-js/2024?source=this_week_in_react).

translations.ja: まもなく締め切られる[State of React 2024](https://survey.devographics.com/en-US/survey/state-of-react/2024?source=this_week_in_react)調査に回答する最後のチャンスです。でも心配ありません、今度は新たに開始した[State of JS 2024](https://survey.devographics.com/en-US/survey/state-of-js/2024?source=this_week_in_react)調査で皆さんを煩わせます😃。

segments.source_content: We'd be super grateful if you'd share this newsletter or support us here :

translations.ja: このニュースレターをシェアしていただいたり、こちらでサポートしていただけると大変嬉しいです：

* [X / Twitter](https://slo.im/last/x)
* [Bluesky](https://slo.im/last/b)
* [LinkedIn](https://slo.im/last/l)
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ea978e4d
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cf4363fc
@@untranslatable_placeholder_2a3434e4
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}
[![WorkOS: B2B SaaS向けモダンアイデンティティプラットフォーム](/emails/issues/195/workOS.jpg)](https://workos.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=q32024)
**[WorkOS: B2B SaaS向けモダンアイデンティティプラットフォーム](https://workos.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=q32024)**

segments.source_content: With WorkOS you can start selling to enterprises with just a few lines of code.

translations.ja: WorkOSを使えば、わずか数行のコードで企業向け販売を開始できます。

segments.source_content: 🔐 WorkOS AuthKit supports a complete user management solution along with **SSO, SCIM, RBAC, & FGA**.

translations.ja: 🔐 WorkOS AuthKitは、**SSO、SCIM、RBAC、FGA**を含む完全なユーザー管理ソリューションをサポートします。

segments.source_content: 🏗️ The APIs are **flexible, easy-to-use, and modular**. Pick and choose what you need and integrate in minutes.

translations.ja: 🏗️ APIは**柔軟で使いやすく、モジュール式**です。必要な機能を選び、数分で統合できます。

segments.source_content: 🎨 Design and user experience are everything. From the quality of our documentation to how your users onboard, we **remove all the unnecessary complexity for developers**.

translations.ja: 🎨 デザインとユーザーエクスペリエンスがすべてです。ドキュメントの品質からユーザーのオンボーディングまで、開発者にとって不要な複雑さを**すべて取り除きます**。

segments.source_content: ✨ AuthKit is **free up to 1 million MAUs** and includes bot protection, MFA, RBAC, & more.

translations.ja: ✨ AuthKitは**100万MAUまで無料**で、ボット対策、MFA、RBACなどを含みます。

segments.source_content: 🤝 WorkOS is trusted by hundreds of leading startups like **Perplexity**, **Vercel**, & **Webflow**.

translations.ja: 🤝 WorkOSは**Perplexity**、**Vercel**、**Webflow**など、数百の主要スタートアップに信頼されています。
[WorkOSを始める](https://workos.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=q32024) 🚀
## ⚛️ React {#react}

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Product for Engineers - The magic of small engineering teams](https://dub.sh/twir-nov13)
* 👀 [React PR - Make prerendering always non-blocking](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/31452): The Suspense siblings prerendering feature (delaying the React 19 release) is re-re-landing after a few back and forths. Turns out there was a hard-to-find one-line bug.
* 👀 [react-server - Add initial README](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/main/packages/react-server): The experimental package for creating custom React streaming server renderers now has some initial documentation. Provides 2 implementations: Fizz for SSR and Flight for RSCs. Advanced content, useful for framework authors looking to add RSC support.
* 👀 [Next.js 15 PR - Add `expireTag` and `expirePath` APIs](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72485): The \`revalidateTag\` and \`revalidatePath\` APIs are being deprecated and renamed with more explicit names. Also it’s possible to pass multiple tags at once now.
* 👀 [React Compiler case study - Adopting the compiler in Sanity Studio](https://github.com/reactwg/react-compiler/discussions/33): Adapting the compiler improved their editor fps and helped surface bugs they didn’t know they had.
* 🐦 [”The first Turbopack prod build on Vercel is live”](https://x.com/rauchg/status/1854922385046356445)
* 📣 [Framer Motion is now independent, introducing Motion](https://motion.dev/blog/framer-motion-is-now-independent-introducing-motion): The popular React animation library plans to expand and support other frameworks.
* 🗓️ [React-Africa](https://react-africa.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇲🇦 Casablanca - 29 November - **Last call** ! You still have a chance to get your ticket, and don’t forget the [10% discount](https://ti.to/react-rally/react-rally-2024/discount/TWIR) with code "TWIR".
* 🗓️ [React Day Berlin](https://reactday.berlin/?utm_source=Newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇩🇪 Berlin - 13 & 16 December - 10% discount with code TWIR. Full line-up revealed !
* 📜 [Uncontrolled or controlled: A matter of perspective](https://buildui.com/posts/uncontrolled-vs-controlled-a-matter-of-perspective): A component can both be controlled and uncontrolled. I decided to call this RSC: React Schrödinger Component.
* 📜 [React is a programming language, and its rules are its syntax](https://buildui.com/posts/react-is-a-programming-language-and-its-rules-are-its-syntax): Interesting thoughts on React rules you have to learn, and constraints that cannot be encoded into the programming language.
* 📜 [The magic of keeping one level of abstraction per function](https://www.tymzap.com/blog/the-magic-of-keeping-one-abstraction-level-per-function): Encourages you to keep each function at a consistent level of abstraction. This includes React components, and I couldn’t agree more.
* 📜 [React and FormData](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-form-data/): Using `Object.fromEntries` won’t automatically handle multiple form inputs with the same name.
* 📜 [Dynamically Generating PWA App Icons in the Next.js App Router](https://aurorascharff.no/posts/dynamically-generating-app-icons-with-nextjs-app-router-and-nextpwa/): Dynamic generation of the PWA manifest to obtain different icons per environment.
* 📜 [Make dangerouslySetInnerHTML Safer by Disabling Inline Event Handlers](https://macarthur.me/posts/safer-dangerouslysetinnerhtml/): React dangerouslySetInnerHTML will not execute scripts but can still execute inline handlers and introduce attack vectors. Make sure to sanitize your inputs.
* 📜 [Supporting Offline Mode in TanStack Query](https://lucas-barake.github.io/persisting-tantsack-query-data-locally/): Using the Effect library.
* 📜 [Conditional Props in React Using Type Discrimination](https://elanmed.dev/blog/conditional-props-using-type-discrimination)
* 📜 [Managing Interactive Demos in MDX](https://abhisaha.com/blog/managing-interactive-demos-mdx)
* 📜 [Example of Using useSyncExternalStore with LocalStorage](https://www.56kode.com/posts/using-usesyncexternalstore-with-localstorage/)
* 📜 [Vercel Makes Changes to Next.js To Simplify Self-Hosting](https://thenewstack.io/vercel-makes-changes-to-next-js-to-simplify-self-hosting/)
* 📦 [Remix 2.14](https://remix.run/docs/en/main/start/changelog#v2140) & [React Router 6.28](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v6280): Both releases preparing the arrival of React Router v7. New `future.unstable_routeConfig` flag, deprecating `SerializeFrom` and `json/defer`.
* 📦 [Storybook 8.4 - 1-click Component Testing in browser, smaller, RN Storybook 8](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-8-4/)
* 📦 [Next.js AI Chatbot Template 3.0](https://vercel.com/changelog/next-js-ai-chatbot-template-3-0)
* 📦 [Toldo - Elevated dialog component for React, based on Radix](https://github.com/raphaelsalaja/toldo)
* 📦 [State-in-URL - Deep links and url state synchronization without the hassle](https://github.com/asmyshlyaev177/state-in-url): An alternative to nuqs with different serialization opinions.
* 📦 [ImmutableJS 5.0 - Improve Map typing, remove deprecated methods](https://github.com/immutable-js/immutable-js/releases/tag/v5.0.0)
* 📦 [Gatsby 5.14 - Performance improvements and security fixes](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/releases/tag/gatsby%405.14.0)
* 🎥 [Jack Herrington - Tanstack Start vs NextJS - Server Functions Battle](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iun1DE_oHG0)
* 🎥 [Theo - The fastest website ever? McMaster-Carr](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fWfIf7Vfjec)
* 🎙️ [JSParty - How Vercel thinks about Next.js, with Tom Occhino](https://changelog.com/jsparty/345)

translations.ja:
* 💸 [Product for Engineers - 小規模エンジニアリングチームの魔法](https://dub.sh/twir-nov13)
* 👀 [React PR - プリレンダリングを常に非ブロッキングにする](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/31452): Suspense兄弟要素のプリレンダリング機能（React 19リリースを遅らせていた）が、何度かのやり直しを経て再実装されました。実は見つけにくい1行のバグがあったことが判明。
* 👀 [react-server - 初期READMEを追加](https://github.com/facebook/react/tree/main/packages/react-server): カスタムReactストリーミングサーバーレンダラーを作成する実験的パッケージに初期ドキュメントが追加されました。SSR用のFizzとRSC用のFlightという2つの実装を提供。RSCサポートを追加したいフレームワーク作者向けの高度な内容。
* 👀 [Next.js 15 PR - `expireTag`と`expirePath` APIを追加](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/72485): `revalidateTag`と`revalidatePath` APIは非推奨となり、より明確な名前に改名されます。また、複数のタグを一度に渡せるようになりました。
* 👀 [React Compilerケーススタディ - Sanity Studioでのコンパイラ採用](https://github.com/reactwg/react-compiler/discussions/33): コンパイラを適応させた結果、エディタのfpsが向上し、気づいていなかったバグが表面化しました。
* 🐦 [「Vercel上で初のTurbopack本番ビルドが公開」](https://x.com/rauchg/status/1854922385046356445)
* 📣 [Framer Motionが独立、Motionを紹介](https://motion.dev/blog/framer-motion-is-now-independent-introducing-motion): 人気のReactアニメーションライブラリが拡張し、他のフレームワークもサポート予定。
* 🗓️ [React-Africa](https://react-africa.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇲🇦 カサブランカ - 11月29日 - **最終呼びかけ**！まだチケットを入手するチャンスがあり、コード"TWIR"で[10%割引](https://ti.to/react-rally/react-rally-2024/discount/TWIR)をお忘れなく。
* 🗓️ [React Day Berlin](https://reactday.berlin/?utm_source=Newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇩🇪 ベルリン - 12月13日＆16日 - コードTWIRで10%割引。全ラインナップ公開！
* 📜 [非制御か制御か：視点の問題](https://buildui.com/posts/uncontrolled-vs-controlled-a-matter-of-perspective): コンポーネントは制御と非制御の両方になり得ます。これをRSC: Reactシュレーディンガーコンポーネントと呼ぶことにしました。
* 📜 [Reactはプログラミング言語であり、そのルールが構文である](https://buildui.com/posts/react-is-a-programming-language-and-its-rules-are-its-syntax): 学ぶ必要があるReactのルールと、プログラミング言語にエンコードできない制約についての興味深い考察。
* 📜 [関数ごとに1つの抽象レベルを保つ魔法](https://www.tymzap.com/blog/the-magic-of-keeping-one-abstraction-level-per-function): 各関数を一貫した抽象レベルに保つことを推奨。Reactコンポーネントも含まれ、私も完全に同意します。
* 📜 [ReactとFormData](https://www.robinwieruch.de/react-form-data/): `Object.fromEntries`を使っても、同じ名前の複数のフォーム入力は自動的に処理されません。
* 📜 [Next.js App RouterでPWAアプリアイコンを動的に生成](https://aurorascharff.no/posts/dynamically-generating-app-icons-with-nextjs-app-router-and-nextpwa/): 環境ごとに異なるアイコンを得るためのPWAマニフェストの動的生成。
* 📜 [dangerouslySetInnerHTMLをインラインイベントハンドラー無効化でより安全に](https://macarthur.me/posts/safer-dangerouslysetinnerhtml/): ReactのdangerouslySetInnerHTMLはスクリプトを実行しませんが、インラインハンドラーは実行可能で攻撃ベクトルになり得ます。入力を必ずサニタイズしてください。
* 📜 [TanStack Queryでオフラインモードをサポート](https://lucas-barake.github.io/persisting-tantsack-query-data-locally/): Effectライブラリを使用。
* 📜 [型判別を使ったReactでの条件付きプロパティ](https://elanmed.dev/blog/conditional-props-using-type-discrimination)
* 📜 [MDXでインタラクティブデモを管理する](https://abhisaha.com/blog/managing-interactive-demos-mdx)
* 📜 [useSyncExternalStoreとLocalStorageを使用する例](https://www.56kode.com/posts/using-usesyncexternalstore-with-localstorage/)
* 📜 [Vercel、Next.jsをセルフホスティングしやすくする変更を実施](https://thenewstack.io/vercel-makes-changes-to-next-js-to-simplify-self-hosting/)
* 📦 [Remix 2.14](https://remix.run/docs/en/main/start/changelog#v2140) & [React Router 6.28](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v6280): どちらもReact Router v7の到来に向けた準備リリース。新しい`future.unstable_routeConfig`フラグ、`SerializeFrom`と`json/defer`の非推奨化。
* 📦 [Storybook 8.4 - ブラウザでの1クリックコンポーネントテスト、小型化、RN Storybook 8](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-8-4/)
* 📦 [Next.js AIチャットボットテンプレート3.0](https://vercel.com/changelog/next-js-ai-chatbot-template-3-0)
* 📦 [Toldo - Radixベースの高機能ダイアログコンポーネント](https://github.com/raphaelsalaja/toldo)
* 📦 [State-in-URL - 面倒な作業なしでディープリンクとURL状態同期を実現](https://github.com/asmyshlyaev177/state-in-url): nuqsの代替で、異なるシリアライゼーション方針を持っています。
* 📦 [ImmutableJS 5.0 - Mapの型付け改善、非推奨メソッド削除](https://github.com/immutable-js/immutable-js/releases/tag/v5.0.0)
* 📦 [Gatsby 5.14 - パフォーマンス改善とセキュリティ修正](https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby/releases/tag/gatsby%405.14.0)
* 🎥 [Jack Herrington - Tanstack Start vs NextJS - サーバー関数バトル](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Iun1DE_oHG0)
* 🎥 [Theo - 史上最速のウェブサイト？McMaster-Carr](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fWfIf7Vfjec)
* 🎙️ [JSParty - Tom Occhinoと考えるVercelのNext.jsへの取り組み](https://changelog.com/jsparty/345)
@@untranslatable_placeholder_bfba2ea7
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}
[![Reactアプリでドキュメントの超能力を解き放とう！](/emails/issues/209/nutrient.jpg)](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)

segments.source_content: **[Unleash Document Superpowers in Your React Apps!](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)**

translations.ja: **[Reactアプリでドキュメントの超能力を解き放とう！](https://www.nutrient.io/sdk/web)**

segments.source_content: Attention React enthusiasts: PSPDFKit is now **Nutrient**! 👋 We may have a new name, but our Web SDK is the same best in class choice you've come to rely on for viewing, annotating, and editing PDFs and other document types.

translations.ja: React愛好者の皆さんへ：PSPDFKitは今や**Nutrient**に！ 👋 名前は新しくなりましたが、Web SDKはこれまで同様、PDFやその他のドキュメントタイプの表示、注釈付け、編集において最高クラスの選択肢です。

segments.source_content:
* 🏎️ Get started quickly with a free trial and extensive documentation
* ⏱️ Save time developing by leveraging the slick built-in UI and **Baseline-UI**, our new design system
* 🛠️ Leverage extensive APIs for processing and customization
* 🆘 Make use of our support and solution engineering team to get help from domain experts

translations.ja:
* 🏎️ 無料トライアルと充実したドキュメントで素早く始められます
* ⏱️ 洗練された組み込みUIと新しいデザインシステム**Baseline-UI**を活用して開発時間を節約
* 🛠️ 処理とカスタマイズのための豊富なAPIを活用
* 🆘 ドメインエキスパートからの支援を得るためにサポートとソリューションエンジニアリングチームを利用

segments.source_content: We've got you covered on **all platforms** from mobile to backend.

translations.ja: モバイルからバックエンドまで、**すべてのプラットフォーム**をカバーしています。

segments.source_content: Want to work on challenging problems and have **impact on hundreds of applications**? Check out our open positions such as [Senior Frontend Developer](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend).

translations.ja: 挑戦的な問題に取り組み、**数百のアプリケーションに影響を与えたい**ですか？ [シニアフロントエンド開発者](https://www.nutrient.io/company/careers/web-frontend)などの求人をチェックしてください。
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
[![Expo 52](/emails/issues/209/expo52.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-12-sdk-52)
[**Expo SDK 52**](https://expo.dev/changelog/2024/11-12-sdk-52)

segments.source_content: Just after the excellent React Native 0.76 milestone release, here comes Expo SDK 52, just as great. There’s a huge changelog and many expo package updates. My favorite items are:

translations.ja: 素晴らしいReact Native 0.76のリリース直後に、Expo SDK 52が登場しました。変更履歴は膨大で、多くのexpoパッケージが更新されています。特にお気に入りの項目は：

segments.source_content:
* New Architecture enabled by default for new projects, opt-in for existing ones. Expo Go now only supports the New Architecture.
* Expo Router 4, React Navigation 7
* Universal Server Components and Server Actions (experimental)
* DOM Components with the `’use dom’` directive for incremental migrations or seamlessly integrating a WebView
* React Native DevTools
* Universal Tree Shaking (experimental)
* React Compiler (experimental)

translations.ja:
* 新規プロジェクトではNew Architectureがデフォルトで有効、既存プロジェクトではオプトイン。Expo GoはNew Architectureのみをサポート。
* Expo Router 4、React Navigation 7
* ユニバーサルサーバーコンポーネントとサーバーアクション（実験的）
* DOMコンポーネントと`’use dom’`ディレクティブによる段階的な移行またはWebViewのシームレスな統合
* React Native DevTools
* ユニバーサルツリーシェイキング（実験的）
* Reactコンパイラ（実験的）
こちらもおすすめ：

segments.source_content:
* 👀 [Expo Launch Party - November 18-22](https://expo.dev/launch-party)
* 🎥 [notJust Dev - Expo SDK 52 & React Native 0.76: Latest Updates and Improvements](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gQqE55rkHO0)

translations.ja:
* 👀 [Expo Launch Party - 11月18-22日](https://expo.dev/launch-party)
* 🎥 [notJust Dev - Expo SDK 52 & React Native 0.76: 最新の更新と改善点](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gQqE55rkHO0)

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Expo Starter – A Universal Mobile App Kit to Help You Get Started Quickly and Save Time and Money](https://expostarter.com?utm_source=this-week-in-react\&utm_medium=newsletter\&utm_campaign=this-week-in-react-13-11-2024)
* 👀 [React Native Android PR - Edge-to-Edge Modal, `navigationBarTranslucent` prop](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/47254)
* 👀 [Bluesky App PR - Reduce Reanimated serialization traffic](https://github.com/bluesky-social/social-app/pull/6219): Dan Abramov found a weird `makeMutable` trick to optimize Reanimated serialization that doubled the ap
* 📜 [What is the best React Native list component?](https://expo.dev/blog/what-is-the-best-react-native-list-component)
* 📜 [How to add an animated splash screen with expo-custom-assets](https://expo.dev/blog/how-to-add-an-animated-splash-screen-with-expo-custom-assets)
* 📜 [Build an AI Voice Recorder with React Native (Firebase, Whisper API, Expo)](https://galaxies.dev/react-native-voice-recorder-whisper-api)
* 📦 [React Native Audio API](https://github.com/software-mansion-labs/react-native-audio-api): Software Mansion unveils an early version of a lib implementing the Web Audio API.
* 📦 [React Native Skia List](https://samuelscheit.github.io/react-native-skia-list/): Why not make React Native lists even faster with a canvas 🤭 It’s harder and less familiar to implement classic UI layouts with Skia, but another 🐦 [upcoming Yoga binding lib](https://x.com/Swami__L/status/1854932920936566980) could help.
* 📦 [React Native True Sheet](https://github.com/lodev09/react-native-true-sheet): Unlike BottomSheet, it’s implemented native-side instead of with RN/Reanimated. The next release will support Android edge-to-edge.
* 📦 [React Native Screen 4.0 - Supports React Navigation 7, Stack screen preloading, native bottom sheet, Fabric fixes](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.0.0)
* 📦 [React Native Bottom Tabs 0.5 - Support for SVG and custom fonts](https://github.com/okwasniewski/react-native-bottom-tabs/releases/tag/v0.5.0)
* 📦 [React Native Windows 0.76 - Preview release of New Architecture](https://github.com/microsoft/react-native-windows/releases/tag/react-native-windows_v0.76.0)

* 📦 [Rspack 1.1 - faster builds/HMR, improve HtmlRspackPlugin and JSDoc, community adoption from Nuxt/Docusaurus](https://rspack.dev/blog/announcing-1-1)
